attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
